logger.message: {"uniqueTransactionId": "#[vars.globalProperties.uniqueTransactionId]", "msg" : "Total no of environments in the org #[vars.envCount]"}

ee:variables.ee:set-variable:
%dw 2.0 var index = vars.counter -1 output application/json --- vars.envDetails << {
envName : vars.envList[index].envName, prod : vars.envList[index].prod, envDetails : payload }

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/java --- vars.envList map { envName : $.envName, prod : $.prod, envDetails : payload[$$]
}

%dw 2.0 output application/csv --- payload reduce ( (ev, result=[]) -> (result ++ (ev.envDetails map { EnvName: ev.envName, IsProd: ev.prod, Inteface: $.domain, WorkerTypeName: $.workers."type".name, WorkerTypeWeight: $.workers."type".weight, WorkerTypeCpu: $.workers."type".cpu, WorkerTypeMemory: $.workers."type".memory, Amount: $.workers.amount, TotalOrgWorkers: $.workers.totalOrgWorkers, RemainingOrgWorkers: $.workers.remainingOrgWorkers, LastUpdateTime: $.lastUpdateTime as DateTime { unit : "milliseconds" } as DateTime { format : "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm" }, FileName: $.fileName, MuleVer: $.muleVersion.version, MuleVer_support_EndBy: $.muleVersion.endOfSupportDate as DateTime { unit : "milliseconds" } as Date, Region: $.region, PersistentQueues: $.persistentQueues, MonitoringEnabled: $.monitoringEnabled, StaticIPsEnabled: $.staticIPsEnabled, //IPAddresses: $.ipAddresses joinBy "|", BinaryFileName: $.fileName, Status: $.status, DeploymentUpdateStatus: $.deploymentUpdateStatus, DeploymentErrorMessage: ($.deploymentErrorMessage default "") replace "," with "",
})) )
